In a message dated 6/7/2003 1:29:16 PM Central Daylight Time, 
swords@... writes:

> A tsuba I've got on Ebay right now--Kyo-Shoami, most likely--has the motif 
> of "maple leaves and a deer antler" represented on it.  Somebody just asked 
> me about the meaning of this design and I realized, I have no idea.  Can any 
> of you comment on what this motif represents

Ron,
It's NOT a deer horn, if you look closer you will see it's part of the tree 
trunk/branch.
I know because I have an almost identical one  except  mine is a peach 
tree...........

Milt
